recipeList.recipeName: Chicken, Rice, and Broccoli Breakfast Bowl
recipeList.directions: 1. Begin by cooking 1 cup of rice on the stove or in the microwave according to package instructions.  2. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add the chicken. Season with salt. Cook for 6-7 minutes until chicken is cooked through. 3. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook for an additional 3 minutes.  4. Once the rice, chicken, and broccoli are cooked, combine them in a bowl and enjoy!
recipeList.ingredients: Chicken (1 cup), Rice (1 cup), Broccoli (1/2 cup), Salt (1/2 teaspoon)
